Bulgaria+appointment ( Da Dabi Global Solutions)  

Price : 1750 euro  750euro advance payment 1000euro  after date at embassy .  

Document production time : 2-3 months $^+$ appointment 1 month 1 year contract  (if the candidate recommends himself well, the contract is extended by the employer)  

Documents for submission:  

Scanned copy of passport $\bullet$ Resume (will be an advantage)  

●​ PСС (when the candidate will apply at the embassy, ​have it with you)   
●​ Medical insurance (when the candidate will apply at the embassy, ​have it with you)  

Vacancy:  

1.Hotel Complexes $\bullet$ accommodation -free $\bullet$ meals - free 3 times $\bullet$ transport - free  

Salary : 500–700 euro netto .
